00061 /*
00062  * authunix_prot.c
00063  * XDR for UNIX style authentication parameters for RPC
00064  *
00065  * Copyright (C) 1984, Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00066  */
00067 #include <stdio.h>
00068 #include <stdlib.h>
00069 #include <unistd.h>
00070 #include <string.h>
00071 #include <errno.h>
00072 #include "Types.h"
00073 #include "Xdr.h"
00074 #include "Rpc.h"
00075 #include "Auth.h"
00076 #include "Auth_unix.h"
00077 #include "Clnt.h"
00078 #include <netinet/in.h>
00079 
00080 /*
00081  * XDR for unix authentication parameters.
00082  */
00083 bool_t Xdr_Authunix_parms( register XDR * xdrs, register struct Authunix_parms * p)
00084 {
00085 
00086   Xdrproc_t xdrproc_gid ;
00087   
00088         if (Xdr_u_long(xdrs, &(p->aup_time))
00089             && Xdr_string(xdrs, &(p->aup_machname), MAX_MACHINE_NAME)
00090             && (sizeof (uid_t) == sizeof (short int)?Xdr_u_short(xdrs, (u_short *) &(p->aup_uid)): Xdr_u_int(xdrs, (u_int *) &(p->aup_uid)))
00091             && (sizeof (gid_t) == sizeof (short int)?Xdr_u_short(xdrs, (u_short *) &(p->aup_gid)): Xdr_u_int(xdrs, (u_int *) &(p->aup_gid)))
00092             && Xdr_array( xdrs, 
00093                     (caddr_t *)&(p->aup_gids),
00094                     &(p->aup_len), 
00095                     NGRPS, 
00096                     sizeof(gid_t),
00097                     Xdr_u_int ) )
00098     {
00099       return (TRUE);
00100     }
00101         return (FALSE);
00102 }
